body_html: Segmentation fault ${CMAKE_VERSION} .. when running CMake / gcc, that just looks fundamentally broken. I dont have an idea of what's going on. Try upgrading your CMake and see if it helps. Use a different compiler, maybe gcc 4.9.2 from devtoolset-3
body_text: Segmentation fault ${CMAKE_VERSION} ..  when running CMake / gcc, that just looks fundamentally broken. I dont have an idea of what's going on. Try upgrading your CMake and see if it helps. Use a different compiler, maybe gcc 4.9.2 from devtoolset-3
body: `Segmentation fault ${CMAKE_VERSION} .. ` when running CMake / gcc, that just looks fundamentally broken. I dont have an idea of what's going on. Try upgrading your CMake and see if it helps. Use a different compiler, maybe gcc 4.9.2 from [devtoolset-3](https://www.softwarecollections.org/en/scls/rhscl/devtoolset-3/)
